Compatible with iOS 7, 8, 9 and 10

This tweak shows the current phase of the moon next to the time in the status bar. It's updated every time the clock is updated.

- Easter egg, tap the date/time to find out. - Added a switch to display the real moon in the status bar - The lock screen moon doesn't dance around anymore - added a switch to disable the status bar moons - added a switch to hide date/time on the lock screen - improved quarter moon drawing

- The lock screen moon can now be positioned over the time view


Exciting new update: lock screen moon with real moon images!

Also in this update: option to remove the moon from the lock screen status bar


- More accurate new moon

- Added a slider for horizontal positioning
- Fixed a bug that affected correct rendering on the lock screen

- Added sliders to the settings page to set the lock screen moon size and vertical position

- The moon can be added to the lock screen now

- Added a switch to display the moon on the other side of the clock

- Added a settings switch for people in the southern hemisphere
